Prerequisites

Spellschool (Any) 3 Ranks

Benefits

When casting a spell with the line area effect target enhancement and this modification, the mage can direct the line in any shape they wish, as long as the line stays connected, to the length the spell allows. This modification adds 3 SP to the spellâ€™s cost.

Normal

Line Area Effect Target enhancements can only be cast in a straight line.

Special

When guiding the line, use the standard movement rules for diagonals. This feat can not be used for spells that do not have the line area effect.
